item.title: TTT Reborn
item.description: I’m currently taking a break from my original “The Specialists” project to work on TTT Reborn. As someone who has played thousands of hours of the original TTT, I am excited to be a part of the team that is remaking the gamemode for s&box. Networking in s&box I haven’t had the opportunity yet to take any networking classes at my university yet. It made me a bit worried when I decided to write some networking code needed for TTT Reborn.
